personalDetails.name: Ajay Singh
personalDetails.tagline: I develop apps for web, mobile, and desktop.
personalDetails.about: I love coding with JavaScript, especially for websites using React and React Native. I also enjoy working with Express.js, Node.js, MySQL, and MongoDB to build strong back-end systems. I'm always excited to push the limits of technology and find new ways to solve real-world problems.

projectDetails.title: React + TS (Project)
projectDetails.description: I created an website in React + typescript .

projectDetails.title: Cyclops App (Attendance portal)
projectDetails.description: I created an attendance app in React Native called Cyclops App. This app is designed to efficiently track and manage attendance records.

projectDetails.title: 9xBuddy (Mobile)
projectDetails.description: I created an app in React Native called 9xBuddy Mobile App. This app serves as an online video download helper.

projectDetails.title: 9xBuddy (Desktop)
projectDetails.description: I created an app in React called 9xBuddy Desktop App. This app serves as an online video download helper.

projectDetails.title: Admin Panel
projectDetails.description: I created an admin panel in Next.js where users can manage the website and change the website's database from it.

projectDetails.title: Ecommerce Website
projectDetails.description: I created an e-commerce website in Next.js and linked it to an Express.js database

projectDetails.title: Wonder Tour
projectDetails.description: I created a tour website using PHP, HTML, and CSS where people can book tour plans.

projectDetails.title: Blog Website
projectDetails.description: I created a simple blog website in Django where I write my blogs about anything I like.

projectDetails.title: Unity 3D
projectDetails.description: I created a 3D Unity project where I show stats in 3D. All the work was done in Unity.

projectDetails.title: Unity 2D
projectDetails.description: I created a 2D Unity project where I show stats in 2D. All the work was done in Unity.

projectDetails.title: Namaz Alert (Android App)
projectDetails.description: I created an Android app called Namaz Alert using Kotlin. This app alerts people when it's time for Namaz.

projectDetails.title: SudoQr Code (Android App)
projectDetails.description: I created an Android app called Suqo QR Code, which allows users to scan and create QR codes.
